PHRASE.LANG: So you want to be a swashbuckling seadog? Well, for starters you're going to need this pirate bandana. [#Legal]
Alors comme ça, tu veux devenir un flibustier ? Commence donc par porter ce bandana de pirate.[#Legal]
Du willst also ein säbelrasselnder Seebär sein? Nun, für den Anfang brauchst du erst mal dieses Piraten-Kopftuch. [#Legal]
E così vuoi essere uno spericolato lupo di mare? Beh, per cominciare ti servirà questa bandana pirata.[#Legal]
¿Quieres ser un lobo de mar de capa y espada? Bueno, para empezar vas a necesitar este pañuelo de pirata.[#Legal]
So you want to be a swashbuckling seadog? Well, for starters you're going to need this pirate bandana. [#Legal]
So you want to be a swashbuckling seadog? Well, for starters you're going to need this pirate bandana. [#Legal]
